an9.2:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.2:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hoti”ti?
an9.2:1.4: “Saddhance, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissaya akusalam pajahati kusalam bhaveti, pahinamevassa tam akusalam hoti.
an9.2:1.8: pannance, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissaya akusalam pajahati kusalam bhaveti, pahinamevassa tam akusalam hoti.
an9.2:1.9: Tam hissa bhikkhuno akusalam pahinam hoti suppahinam, yamsa ariyaya pannaya disva pahinam.
an9.2:2.1: Tena ca pana, bhikkhu, bhikkhuna imesu pancasu dhammesu patitthaya cattaro upanissaya vihatabba.
an9.2:2.3: Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu sankhayekam patisevati, sankhayekam adhivaseti, sankhayekam parivajjeti, sankhayekam vinodeti.
an9.2:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hoti”ti.
